studyMetadata.title: Visualization Study
studyMetadata.description: A study to test the empirical effectiveness of truncating the y-axis of bar charts.

config.title: Average Monthly Temperatures for Country U

response.prompt: Select the option that orders the months from highest to lowest average temperature.
options: Nov, Jan, Sep, Apr, Feb, Dec, Jun, Jul, Aug, May, Oct, Mar
Mar, Jul, Dec, Jan, May, Oct, Aug, Nov, Apr, Jun, Sep, Feb
Dec, Nov, Oct, Aug, Sep, Jul, May, Jun, Mar, Apr, Feb, Jan
Jan, Feb, Apr, Mar, Jun, May, Jul, Sep, Aug, Oct, Nov, Dec

correctAnswer.answer: Dec, Nov, Oct, Aug, Sep, Jul, May, Jun, Mar, Apr, Feb, Jan

correctAnswer.answer: Dec, Nov, Oct, Aug, Sep, Jul, May, Jun, Mar, Apr, Feb, Jan
